about_the_game:
Get ready for an intense ride in Confinement, an FP4 (First Person Paced Precision Platformer) that will push your skills to the absolute limit. Navigate your way out of a tight, trap-filled environment where every move counts. Precise movement and the Dash mechanic are key to overcoming the brutal obstacles that stand in your way.

Game Highlights:

Precision Movement: Master every jump and sprint as you navigate meticulously designed levels.

Dash Mechanic: Use Dash to smash through challenges and reach new levels of speed, clearing paths in dynamic and strategic ways. Brutalist Neon Environment: Confinement features a striking, brutalist-inspired visual style with neon accents that create a uniquely immersive atmosphere, underscoring the game’s dark, oppressive setting.

Intense Challenge: Tackle 30 to 40 short, carefully crafted levels that demand speed and accuracy. Finishing each stage as fast as possible ups the challenge, delivering serious replay value and making Confinement ideal for players craving a hardcore, adrenaline-fueled experience.

Competition and Ranking: Confinement also brings a ranking system to ramp up the competition. Players can battle for top spots and high scores, testing themselves and others to claim the leaderboard’s highest ranks. This feature amps up the excitement, pushing gamers to their limits and rewarding the most skilled, quickest players out there.

If you're ready to put your precision and agility to the test in a fierce, challenging environment, Confinement is the game for you!

short_description: Run for your freedom in an oppressive, cloistered space full of traps and challenges. Confinement is a game focused on agile movement and the Dash ability is set in a brutalist architectural environment, the game offers a challenging experience where the player must escape as quickly as possible.
